data.actual_result: Username breaks free of the modal.
data.short_description: Stupidly long usernames break out of invite modal in browsers.
data.steps_to_repro: - Create/Rename a server to be stupidly long (like 32 W's) Note: This works with the new group dm invites aswell.- Create an invite. - Post the invite into a browser that does not beam invites to the app (like firefox).
